title: Fried Ice Cream Pie
directions: Melt the butter in a large skillet then add in the almonds, corn flakes and sugar and brown for 3 to 5 minutes and let cool.
Beat the ice cream, cool whip, sweetened condensed milk and cinnamon together in a large mixing bowl until well combined.
Place half the corn flake mixture in the pie pan and pour the ice cream mixture on top then spread the rest of the corn flake mixture on top of the ice cream mixture.
Freeze for 3 hours, slice and serve. Voila!
